articles.title: Eli Lilly's Alzheimer's Drug Shows Promise in Small Trial - The New York Times
articles.description: Participants with the disease still declined, but much more slowly than those receiving a placebo, investigators say.
articles.content: The drug, donanemab, a monoclonal antibody, binds to a small part of the hard plaques in the brain made of a protein, amyloid, that are hallmarks of Alzheimers disease. Patients received the drug by … [+1112 chars]
